summary: After being fired from her job, Angie teams up with her flatmate to find employment for immigrants.
cast: Kierston Wareing|Juliet Ellis|Leslaw Zurek|Joe Siffleet|Colin Coughlin|Maggie Russell|Raymond Mearns|Davoud Rastgou|Mahin Aminnia|Shadeh Kavousian|Sheeva Kavousian|Frank Gilhooley|David Doyle|Eddie Webber|Johnny Palmiero|Faruk Pruti|Jackie Robinson-Brown|Miro Somers|Neal Barry|Mick Connolly|Sian Wheldon|Malgorzata Zawadzka|Marina Chykalovets|Chisana Gayves|Ludmila Borysh|Faton Gerbeshi|Kevin Hussey|Steve Lorrigan|Nadine Marshall|Angela McGowan|Aleksandar Mikic|Ezequiel Lima Santos|Serge Soric|Branko Tomovic|Radoslaw Kaim
title: En un mundo libre...
